description.en: Mechaverse is a subsidiary game-fi project of Mechaverse Labs, a Japanese Web3 entertainment platform with various forms of game like Auto Chess, Battle Royale, 3D Fighting, sandbox, conquest and UFO Catcher, etc. Mechaverse is a Meta-Dimensional Strategy Game-Fi in The Era of Web3, with the NFT authorization of various well-known Japanese IPs.
